MEANING: # of points in the IMF averages
# of points in the plasma averages

UNITS/COMMENTS: RMS Standard Deviation in average magnitude (word 10), nT
RMS Standard Deviation in field vector, nT (**)
RMS Standard Deviation in GSE X-component average, nT
RMS Standard Deviation in GSE Y-component average, nT
RMS Standard Deviation in GSE Z-component average, nT
P (nPa) = (1.67/10**6) * Np*V**2 * (1+ 4*Na/Np) for hours with non-fill Na/Np ratios and P (nPa) = (2.0/10**6) * Np*V**2 for hours with fill values for Na/Np
= V/Magnetosonic_speed, Magnetosonic speed = [(sound speed)**2 + (Alfv speed)**2]**0.5, The Alfven speed = 20. * B / N**0.5, The sound speed = 0.12 * [T + 1.28*10**5]**0.5
